channel.title: Rocks In The Sky / @_RocksInTheSky

item.title: R to @ShropshireMatt: I might, if I find myself on a suitable adventure :)

item.title: R to @RobGMacfarlane: that's what they both said

item.description: that's what they both said

item.title: R to @waymarksblog: Ha! How about it Rob? Bring me out of RITS-retirement for one final specially-commissioned pic? Maybe team me unwillingly up with a rookie RITS-snapper that I can be grumpy at as we crack the case?
item.dc:creator: @_RocksInTheSky
item.description: Ha! How about it Rob? Bring me out of RITS-retirement for one final specially-commissioned pic? Maybe team me unwillingly up with a rookie RITS-snapper that I can be grumpy at as we crack the case?

item.title: R to @FrankieShrapnel: Thank you I love it
item.dc:creator: @_RocksInTheSky
item.description: Thank you I love it

item.title: R to @C_Lee_W: Aaargh I would love to be out and about taking pics of rocks in the sky right now :'(

item.title: Hello new followers! I'm sorry to say that this account is pretty much dormant at the moment. There could conceivably be fresh Rocks in the Sky pics in the future but unlikely tbh. I'm sorry! xx
item.dc:creator: @_RocksInTheSky
item.description: Hello new followers! I'm sorry to say that this account is pretty much dormant at the moment. There could conceivably be fresh Rocks in the Sky pics in the future but unlikely tbh. I'm sorry! xx

item.title: R to @RobGMacfarlane: I don't think my Broomway pics found their way into Granta - or at least that one isn't mine - they are in the Penguin ebook version though

item.title: R to @RobGMacfarlane: Nothing to do with daisies, Rob, but please can I cheekily draw to the attention of your followers that the last available print of this pic of you walking the Broomway is currently up for sale? (Link in tweet that follows)
item.dc:creator: @_RocksInTheSky
item.description: Nothing to do with daisies, Rob, but please can I cheekily draw to the attention of your followers that the last available print of this pic of you walking the Broomway is currently up for sale? (Link in tweet that follows)

item.title: R to @RobGMacfarlane: On the subject of eye-catching xenoliths, Rob, may I take this opportunity to mention that right now is the last chance for anyone to pick up a print of one of my Rocks in the Sky pics? http://www.rocksinthesky.co.uk
item.dc:creator: @_RocksInTheSky
item.description: On the subject of eye-catching xenoliths, Rob, may I take this opportunity to mention that right now is the last chance for anyone to pick up a print of one of my Rocks in the Sky pics? rocksinthesky.co.uk

item.title: R to @wonderfultrev: These pics are taken on film so that would mean buying the negative. Yes, I would definitely sell one of the negs to someone who wanted it badly enough!
item.dc:creator: @_RocksInTheSky
item.description: These pics are taken on film so that would mean buying the negative. Yes, I would definitely sell one of the negs to someone who wanted it badly enough!

item.title: R to @DMINUS_uk: I may still look out for them, and photograph them when I see them, but I am going to stop selling the photographs. Sometimes you just feel the need to draw a line under a thing, you know?
item.dc:creator: @_RocksInTheSky
item.description: I may still look out for them, and photograph them when I see them, but I am going to stop selling the photographs. Sometimes you just feel the need to draw a line under a thing, you know?

item.title: R to @ShropshireMatt: Urgh I just looked up what happened on that day with the intention of making a "see what I caused" gag but regretted it instantly because of course loads of truly awful things happened on that day 😐
item.dc:creator: @_RocksInTheSky
item.description: Urgh I just looked up what happened on that day with the intention of making a "see what I caused" gag but regretted it instantly because of course loads of truly awful things happened on that day 😐

item.title: R to @_RocksInTheSky: Can't remember where the hagstone is from. Not W. Mersea. I have had it on the dashboard of my van as a kind of good luck charm 4 ages. It broke into 2 pieces when it hit the shingle after I took this pic (still have the pieces in my van wrapped up in foil to hold them together)
item.dc:creator: @_RocksInTheSky
item.description: Can't remember where the hagstone is from. Not W. Mersea. I have had it on the dashboard of my van as a kind of good luck charm 4 ages. It broke into 2 pieces when it hit the shingle after I took this pic (still have the pieces in my van wrapped up in foil to hold them together)

item.title: The spookiest Rocks In The Sky pic I have ever taken: a chalk hagstone shrieking through the skies over West Mersea 👻
item.dc:creator: @_RocksInTheSky
item.description: The spookiest Rocks In The Sky pic I have ever taken: a chalk hagstone shrieking through the skies over West Mersea 👻
